attributes.action: Let Chris Brown Tour Around the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
Chris Browns ban should be lifted.
He has payed for his mistakes and it was his first and only crime.
He does everything for the community and his fans.
I feel he is someone to look up to he has become an extreme role model.
I don't agree with his previous actions but I am extremely proud to call myself a fan.
He has taught me that there are extreme consequences to your actions and chris and his music pulled me out of a dark place and helped me with my personal problems if it wasn't for him I dread to think where I would of ended up.
It's time to stand up for what is right.
